short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to quickly attribute crypto-currency addresses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BLOCKTRACE is excited to announce the release of a Fusion compatible chrome extension to provide users with access to the industries most powerful blockchain intelligence tool for gathering cryptocurrency insights from industry leading blockchain intelligence data providers.

We look forward to continue innovating and pushing the boundaries to help our customers effectively target and combat emerging cyber threats.

Learn more at https://www.blocktrace.com/fusion
